    • Method Detail

      • setLoc

        public void setLoc(javalib.worldimages.Posn pos)
        Sets the location for the platform. Location is based on the given location of a target. The platform is aligned with the bottom edge of the target.

        public javalib.worldimages.WorldImage showPlatform()
        Draws the platform image.
